Warning - JSON File Does Not Exist
This is NOT a standard Minecraft Core.

This core is created by HMCL, which includes parameters cannot read by Minecraft Official Launcher. BakaXL can still try to launch the core, but some features / Mod loading / game experience may not run as expected.
Add a new Minecraft Core or Mod Pack
Some options are unavailable because the Minecraft version is too old.
Some options are unavailable because they are managed by a mod pack provider.
Some options are unavailable because they are managed by the server corresponding to this mod pack.
The JSON file used by this core is not a standard Minecraft core file.
The JSON file for this core is corrupt and can't be read by BakaXL.
This core uses a launcher-specific logo format, which can't be read by BakaXL.
The required Jar file for this core does not exist.
A Minecraft core that this core depends on does not exist.
This core needs to be reset to work properly, go to"Restore > Reset this core".
BakaXL can attempt to repair this core by going to"Recovery > Auto repair".
To load Minecraft shader files, you may need to install"Optifine".
This core does not support the installation of mods.
This core has been run {0} times since {1} was last run.
Unfortunately, this core hasn't been run since its install date.
The basic game version of this core is Minecraft {0}
If the core includes a link from core publisher, BakaXL will show them.
If you want to visit the homepage of the core publisher, please click here. This page is provided by core publisher but not BakaXL.
Visit the Privacy Policy of This Core
If you want to learn about the privacy policy of this core and how it protect your privacy, please click here. This page is provided by core publisher but not BakaXL.
If you want to configure this core manually without affecting other cores, please do it here Don't change anything if you don't know what you're doing.
BakaXL is currently using the globally configured Java settings.
You have enabled a separate Java setting for this core.
Enable a separate Java setting for this core
BakaXL is currently using the globally configured memory settings.
You have enabled a separate memory setting for this core.
Enable a separate memory setting for this core
This core or package has a mod-supporting API installed.

This core or package does not a have an API that supports installing mods. If you want to use mods, you should install Forge, Fabric, or another mod API.
If you believe that BakaXL incorrectly thinks that a core or package does not have an API that supports installing mods, please contact us.
Scanning the core for a mod API
This core has Minecraft Forge installed, version{0}
This core has Fabric Loader installed, version{0}
This core has Quilt Loader installed, version{0}
This core has Liteloader installed, version{0}
This core has Optifine HD installed.
Drag mods into this area to quickly install them.
BakaXL will scan this core's 'Mods' folder and display all supported mod files in this list.
BakaXL did not find any mod files in this core or package.

If Minecraft is not working properly, resetting this core may solve the problem. If you do this, BakaXL will delete the Libraries and the JSON file for the core, and then attempt to get this version from BakaPlaza again.
Remove this core from the game directory

If you do this, this Minecraft core will be permanently deleted from the current game directory, and its mods, maps, screenshots, and other data will be deleted as well.
This process is irreversible. Please proceed with caution.
Clear garbage files from this game core
If you do this, useless junk files, log files, etc. will be deleted; usually, your game will not be affected after these files are deleted.
This core is too lazy to have a description.
BakaXL Task Queue >> No current tasks or notifications
Click on The Tiles Below to Explore More BakaXL Features
There is a new version of BakaXL available {0}!
A new version of BakaXL has been released, an update is required before you can continue. It won't take too long. An internet connection is required during the update.
Login to BakaXL Network to update
To get updates from the currently set BakaXL update channel, you will need to log in to BakaXL Network. Go "BakaXL Settings - Profiles" to log in to your BakaXL Account.
Need to be a member of Insider Program

Oops! It looks like you are not currently a registered BakaXL Insider. To get this Insider version, your account needs to be enrolled as a BakaXL Insider Program member.
Participate in discussions in BakaXL Discord, or using "Afdian" to support the development of BakaXL by enrolling your BakaXL account as an Insider!
But there is actually other ways to update it，BakaXL won't force you to be a sponsor!
Go to "Afdian" and take a look
It might take a little while
We need some information before you can start.
Click and Hold Here/or Press Space to Begin
You can change it at 'Settings - Accessibility' any time
Do not show tiles by default
When you are using some features or themes, BakaXL can play musics or sounds.
BakaXL turns off all sound output
BakaXL will play background musics and sounds
You can always change these in 'Settings'
Let BakaXL Automatically Set Things Up
Looks like that we did not find a JVM on this PC
You must install JVM in order to run Minecraft
Using at least 1024MB of RAM is recommended
A User Profile will store your Minecraft username. After you login to your BakaXL Account, your friends will able to see your profile in their Launcher
You can manage all the profiles in the 'Settings'
Use your current profile to continue
The maximum number of profiles has been reached
BakaXL uses the industry standard for data encryption
You can always modify your profile in 'Settings'
Your modpack provider requires you to authenticate with a specific third-party account
The modpack you are currently using requires BakaXL to create a third-party account and Minecraft profile from "{0}"
Skip for now, do it later
Press the HOME button in the top left corner, or the HOME key on the keyboard to continue.
Need to install a Minecraft Core?
Click here and install a Minecraft Core.
Get your Network ID after Logging In
Go to "Settings - Profiles" and then Login To Your BakaXL Account
Your friends can search for your account by using your BakaXL Network ID. Please include the tag that follows your username when you are telling your friends your BakaXL Network ID.
If you are enrolled in a BakaXL program or are BakaXL certified, they will appear here.
This account is certified by BakaXL
This friend is online now. If they are running Minecraft or using some BakaXL features, they will show here.
Became friends on:{0}。 You became friends by switching BakaXL Network ID.
Your friends' recently played mod packs and play time will show here.
The grass is empty. It seems that there is nothing. If you send a friend request to others, then we will build a milestone here.
There is a footprint on the grass. Who will it be? We will build a milestone here after you accept a friend request.
The milestone was removed. There are only wreckages of the milestone on the grass. If you want to clean the wreckages up, you need to remove the other side from your blacklist.
You walked to this place, but there are all milestones around. You looked around and didn't see your own milestone, it fills you with determination.
When you remove a friend, you will also removed from the other side's friends list. If you want to add this friend again, you will need to resend the request.
You will become strangers when you remove the other side from your blacklist. If you want to add this friend again, you will need to resend the request.

This interface has your own information. You stand here, but don't know what to do.
You looked behind to BakaXL, but we don't know what to do either.
Oh, by the way: In the new version of BakaXL, we have changed the behavior that BakaXL performs a friend search, so keeping searching about yourself will have no impact on the server performance.
Your friends see your online status and name of the mod pack you are playing. You can go to the Privacy Settings to modify related options, or change your online status to "Stealth"。
If you are the lobby's creator, then you can invite your friend to your lobby here.
The others will show in your friends list after you accept the request. They won't receive a notification after you ignore the request.
Your friend will receive your request once you send it. All the requests sent by your friends will be shown here.
Oops, it seems that there are no requests now. When you receive friend requests, they will show here.
Check all the requests you received and pending.
Enter the friend's BakaXL Network ID (Example: Username#1234)
Search friends by BakaXL Network ID
Find your friends by using BakaXL online services.
Add friends by using BakaXL Interlaced Communication
Play or explore as you continue to use BakaXL. BakaXL Network will recommend you some like-minded users here.
Since you have recently used BakaSkin "{0}".
Since you recently played in the "{0}" server.
Join friends' local network games, or share your clients. Please let all your friends who will take part in be here.
Please login to this BakaXL Account again

Thanks for supporting BakaXL! As a member of the Insider Program, You can choose a custom BakaXL Lobby Code when creating a lobby! Please don't violate BakaXL ToS when using this feature. Using this feature incorrectly will cancel your Insider status.
Start Minecraft and choose "Open to LAN" in a single game, then you can create a lobby. If detecting fails for a long time, try to start Minecraft after running BakaXL as administrator.
Join a friend or public lobby
Enter the Lobby Code that told to you by a friend or someone else to join the lobby. If the lobby is set to friend-only, you must be a friend of the creator to join lobby.
If your friends invite you to join their lobby, they will appear here.
Join a third-party launcher's connect platform

To join an online service created by a third-party launchers (e.g. PCL2, HMCL), then you'll need to install the Multi-Launcher Online Service Plugin in BakaPlaza first.
This service is Coming Soon™
This lobby creator has not started Minecraft. After the game is launched, the version information will be displayed here synchronously.
Lobby creator is playing Minecraft. You must be on the same Minecraft version to join the game. If the lobby creator is using a modpack, you should also use the exact same modpack.
Minecraft version: {0}. You must be on the same Minecraft version to join the game. If the lobby creator is using a modpack, you should also use the exact same modpack.
BakaXL will automatically choose connection way according to your network environment.
Your network environment supports IPv6, BakaXL will#xD; try to establish a faster connection by IPv6.
Your network environment only supports IPv4, but don't worry BakaXL will connect by IPv4.
The BakaXL Network detection service ensures that you can use the relevant functions of the lobby normally. If the service is unavailable, you will not be able to using lobby service.

Introducing auto accept join requests from other lobby joiners. Well, this is probably useful when you're going to be too lazy to manually handle requests from online friends. Caution. This will allow all users who know the Loby Code to join the lobby at will.
Connect with Relay when cannot connect directly

When BakaXL cannot establish a direct connection with the other players, try connect via the BakaXL Network Relay service. Your network traffic will be securely relayed through trusted BakaXL servers.
If you are currently playing in Minecraft LAN World, leaving the lobby will cause the connection to the creator host to be disconnected.
If a user has requested to join the lobby, they will be displayed here.
Select a user to further view their account information, or add them as friends.
You are the lobby creator, you can move the user out of this lobby by long-pressing the corresponding user.
I'm now at BakaXL Online Game Lobby! Enter the lobby code: <{0}> in Bakaverse to join!
I'm now at BakaXL Online Game Lobby playing [{0}]! Enter the lobby code: <{0}> in Bakaverse to join!
I'm now at BakaXL Online Game Lobby playing [{0}] (Minecraft {1})! Enter the lobby code: <{0}> in Bakaverse to join!
Go to BakaXL Account to modify settings

The SkinShare feature allows other BakaXL Network friends, in-server players or online lobby participants who also have this feature enabled to see your offline skins. When this feature is turned off, BakaXL will stop sharing your skin information to BakaXL Network, and you will not be able to see skins set by other players.
This feature only works when launching Minecraft in Offile Mode.
Let BakaXL Network record my game state

Whether to allow your game status (e.g. game name, version) to be recorded in BakaXL Network. The BakaXL Network server periodically clears the game state cache. Game state will not contain your sensitive information.
When this feature is turned off, BakaXL will stop reporting your game status to the BakaXL Network.
Delete my game state cache from BakaXL Network
Allow BakaXL to recommend friends to me

BakaXL will recommend some like-minded friends to you based on your most recent game status (e.g. modpack name launched, third-party Minecraft servers you've joined,BakaSkins you've used, or mods you've installed).
When this feature is turned off, BakaXL will stop recommending you and will not recommend you to others. If you turn referrals on after a period of time, it may take a while for BakaXL Network to completely stop recommending you to others.
Here you can view and modify some of your account settings.
They a waiting the traffic light.

This resource is from Modrinth, BakaXL BakaPlaza visits it by public API interface provided by Modrinth.
Thanks to contributors at mcmod.cn for providing Chinese localization information for this resource, these information are shared with CC (BY-NC-SA 3.0).
{0} may not be applicable to BakaXL's Privacy Policy. Before using this resource, please visit the publisher's Privacy Policy to learn about how it protect your data.

The Copyright information is generated by BakaXL automatically, contents not from the author may be contained in the resource. This information may not be accurate, please visit the original publish website to learn about the Copyright.
Copyright information for this resource is claimed by the creator. To learn more about the copyright of this resource, please contact the creator of the resource.
All right reserved by the original author.
The resources displayed by BakaXL come from user submissions and automated data collection. Please contact us if you think this resource infringes your copyright.
Visit the Mainpage of the Open-source Project
Visit MCMod for this resource's information (Chinese)
Visit MCBBS for this resource's information (Chinese)
Please wait a moment, I promise it will be done in a minute
Huh? This is a little tricky.
Please check your Internet connection, then try again.
Of course, current BakaXL may not support the resource.
Dependency information will be showed here after selecting a version.
Visit the {0} dependencies needed for this version
The author does not allow third-party Apps to download directly
It's not we don't want to hurry up, but it gave too much.
It seems that no conforming results, we're sad too
Check your filters, or maybe there is really no results.

You are now visiting list of predependent Mods for "{0}". According to the author's definition, BakaXL has made a list of these dependency resources. Resources marked as "Must to Install" must be installed! Otherwise, some weird problems may appeared...
|[Color:Accent]Not all the dependencies support the main resource's Minecraft version| |[Color:Accent]Make sure you have checked the compatiable Minecraft version before installing!! |
If Minecraft fail to start up because you didn't install all the dependencies, BakaXL will be very sad. You must not want BakaXL to be sad, right?
This page turned into a teapot and refused to load content

There seems to be something wrong, self-awareness is prudoced when the page is loading. And it thinks it is a teapot. You can leave this damn place, find a true coffee pot, then let developers of BakaXL solve this problem.
Hypertext Coffee Pot Control Protocol(HTCPCP/1.0): RFC 2324, section 2.3.2: 418 I'm a teapot

We may perform maintenance on the Tips System server without prior notice.
Unofficial BakaXL tips channels from third parties will not be shown here
Please check your internet connection. It's also possible that the BakaXL tips server is undergoing maintenance.
To display tips from a channel on your BakaXL tips homepage, you need to subscribe to that channel.
Please check your internet connection. It's also possible that the channel hasn't posted any tips yet.
BakaXL is currently unable to load details for this tip. Please try again later.

Welcome to BakaXL Settings! We are working to add more wonderful features for BakaXL! Some options not available are the features BakaXL 3.0 not develop completed. Now, we're adjusting features in the interface according to your needs. Hope you can like it!
If you want to learn how to use BakaXL and its features, or get help, you can visit the BakaXL Help and Support Website with your computer or smart device.
BakaXL will record the errors in running automatically. You can click on a error to view all the information recorded.
This information is only stored locally, and will not be uploaded or saved to any BakaXL server.
Want to know more about the data BakaXL collects?
There are no BakaCans here now.
I'm sure that there will be a lot of cans here soon.
Lost Focus Music Lost Focus Behavior
Please contact the BakaXL Development Team to get the solution for this problem.
Manage credential files used by third-party modpacks or servers
Import user profile from other launcher
Export BakaXL user profile to other launcher

After importing other launcher's settings, limited by it's security restrictions, if you have a genuine Minecraft account, you have to enter the login password again. If you export the user profile from BakaXL, the profile will delete from BakaXL. You may still need to set some contents after importing.
Sign in to a BakaXL Account
Sign up for a BakaXL Account
The currently signed in BakaXL account is: {0}

Sign up a BakaXL Account and get a BakaXL Network ID, then you can enjoy the wonderful BakaXL online features.
After adding this game ID to your BakaXL account, you can add friends, check online status between each other, share game clients or join in each other's current games quickly.

All BakaXL instances on this computer will log in to this account. Some of BakaXL's online services and features are not available in all countries or regions.
If you violate BakaXL's account rules, your account will be restricted.
Enter the email address you used for your BakaXL Account.
Enter this BakaXL Account's password. BakaXL will store this information encrypted.
Let BakaXL sign in for me automatically
Some settings are hidden or managed by your server or modpack.
After March 10, 2022, Mojang accounts may not be authenticated

Choose the authentication mode to use when starting Minecraft. Online Mode: Sign in with your Mojang account. Offline Mode: Only use a username.
According to related laws and rules, offline mode is not available in all countries or regions. Support for third party verification services (based on authlib-injector) is coming soon.
Choose the authentication mode to use when starting Minecraft. Use your Mojang account to sign in and start the game.
Choose the authentication mode to use when starting Minecraft. Use your Microsoft Account to sign in and start the game.

Choose the authentication mode to use when starting Minecraft. Only use a custom username to verify offline and start the game.
According to related laws and rules, offline mode is not available in all countries or regions.

Choose the authentication mode to use when starting Minecraft. Use the information of a third party authentication service to verify.
For your account safety, we do not recommend you use the same password as your Mojang account when using third party services.
Set the username you want to use while running Minecraft. Only English characters, numbers, and underscores can be used, Chinese and special symbols are not recommended.
Enter your Mojang Account Email Address.
Enter your Mojang Account Password. BakaXL stores this information encrypted.

Enter your Microsoft account and password on the window that opens. BakaXL does not record your Microsoft account and password. All connections between BakaXL and Microsoft servers use Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) technology.
You are not logged in to your Microsoft Account yet.
This profile has been authorized with a Microsoft Account.
Choose a new Minecraft character skin

Authentication Server(Yggdrasil Server) It is the core of the whole verification system. Once set, requests made using this profile will be sent to this address. You can drag and drop the configuration containing the authentication server information to BakaXL for quick configuration.
Be careful to use non-HTTPS authentication servers, as this will cause your passwords to be transmitted insecurely.
The email address you used when registering for the third-party verification service
The player name or email address you used when registering for this third-party verification service. This authentication server supports login by player name.
The password you used when registering for a third-party verification service

If the server contains supported response metadata, it will be displayed here. The implementation version is not the Minecraft server version. Please use these data checks to verify the server address and server information.
BakaXL is loading Minecraft Character Profiles...
BakaXL cannot load the profile for this Minecraft character. If you continue to have this problem, please check your internet connection.
You can now change your character's skin directly from BakaXL. Minecraft needs to be restarted after changing skins.
Join the SkinShare Network when using this Minecraft Account

With this feature enabled, you will be able to see offline skins set by BakaXL users via offile mode while online. If this feature is turned on, all Mojang Account verification requests need to be relayed and processed through BakaXL.
Set up offline skins for my Minecraft character

Set offline skins for your characters. Minecraft needs to be restarted after changing skins.
If BakaXL Network SkinShare is turned on, after setting offline skins, you can see offline skins set by friends or other players in the lobby.
Changing capes for my Minecraft character
Setting the Capes Display Status allows you to choose whether or not the capes is displayed in-game. If you own more than one cape, you can choose which cape to display in the game here.
It is recommended to turn this option ON when you are using BakaXL on a public computer. BakaXL will only store your Player ID.
BakaXL uses industry-standard encryption to keep your account information safe. For security, please do not reveal your password to anyone.
This profile and the data it contains will be permanently deleted from BakaXL after process. This process is irreversible.
The email you entered is not a valid email address
Failed to get Username, please try again!
You will need to complete an account verification before you return
You must set up a third-party authentication server
You have changed the Username, some content needs to be reloaded.
Your currently selected core has standalone settings enabled. Click here if you want to make individual settings for this core.
Let BakaXL automatically determine Java version

When this option is enabled, BakaXL will automatically select the appropriate JVM version that's require to run Minecraft. Select the appropriateJVM version. If you do not have the correct JVM version installed, BakaXL will automatically install it for you.
To ensure the best experience possible, please always select the most optimal version of Java for the version of Minecraft you are playing.
More granular automatic finding of Java locations
Authorize BakaXL to traverse folders on your computer's disk for Java locations that may not be found by normal searches. Before using this search method, please understand how this feature works.

Under normal circumstances, BakaXL will automatically choose the most suitable Java for your current computer. If you don't know what are you doing, we recommend that you do not modify the value of this option.
Java 8 is recommended for Minecraft running Minecraft 1.16 and lower. BakaXL will redirect to the Java 8 download address provided from a trusted download source.

Java 16 is required to run Minecraft 1.17 or higher. BakaXL will automatically install Java 16 from trusted sources by connecting to the Internet. This process may take several minutes, and you may be charged for network data when using cellular data connection.

Java 17 is required to run Minecraft 1.17 or higher. BakaXL will automatically install Java 17 from trusted sources by connecting to the Internet. This process may take several minutes, and you may be charged for network data when using cellular data connection.

Java 8 is recommended for Minecraft version 1.16 and lower. Java 16 is required to run Minecraft version 1.17 or higher. BakaXL will connect to the internet to automatically install Java from trustedsources. This process may take several minutes and you may have to pay a fee when using cellular data connection.
BakaXL is currently installing Java {0}... it will be displayed here when the installation progress is updated.
BakaXL is currently installing Java {0}... Status: {1}
BakaXL has successfully installed Java {0}. You can select this JVM in JVM List.
BakaXL cannot automatically install Java {0}. This could be due to a corrupted file provided by the download source or an interrupted internet connection.
The memory set in BakaXL Settings
Memory set individually for this core
BakaXL will normally allocate memory automatically based on your computer's configuration. If you don't understand what this option does, we recommend that you don't change these values.
Not recommended, BakaXL can attempt to force release memory to increase available memory.
To manually specify memory size, "Automatically Configure Memory Settings" must be disabled.
Manually configure the amount of memory you want Minecraft to use.
BakaXL 异域计划 / BakaXL Localization Project
本地化实用工具 / Localization Utilities
Select the language used in your region
BakaXL supports languages used by many countries and regions worldwide. This is all thanks to BakaXL users from all over the world. Until translated text is tested, it won't be available.
Go to the BakaXL Localization Project homepage to get the latest text entries and participate as a translator.

Replace the display language with localized text from a specified file during this run. This will help translators debug text.
Don't use this option if you don't know what it does.
BakaXL is connected to the Internet!
BakaXL is not connected to the Internet.
BakaXL will show the result later...
The network environment won't affect the connect experience. This environment is fit for being the lobby creater.
This may affect your connect experience.
Some router or firewall settings may affect your connect experience.
Some router or firewall settings may affect your connect experience. If the lobby creater or your network devices support UPnP, then may alleviate.
This will affect your connect experience.
This will affect your connect experience. If the lobby creater or your network devices support UPnP, then may alleviate.
Your network devices or systems don't support UPnP now. If you enable it, then BakaXL will try to improve your connect experience by this protocol.

Your network devices or systems' support to UPnP isn't normal now. This may cause BakaXL can't improve your connect experience. If you think your network devices or systems don't have the problem, please connect BakaXL Development Team.
BakaXL sends a request to your network devices to improve your connect experience.
BakaXL doesn't begin to test network devices' UPnP support. When you begin to create P2P connections, BakaXL will begin to test and show the result.

If you cannot connect to the Mojang Authentication Server normally, Trying to change a DNS server that is stable and less prone to contamination usually resolves the issue.
If this problem persists, please contact your Internet Service Provider (ISP), also make sure your internet isn't hijacked.
If you're not sure what these options do, don't change it!
Some settings have been moved to Core Settings, Click me!
Sets the title of the Minecraft form launched by BakaXL. Parameters can be used in the header to display dynamic content. ex) {time}: Displays the current system time.

Set advanced startup parameters for Minecraft. It is only used when there are special needs, and the parameters need to be filled in correctly. Normal players do not need to use this function, just leave it blank.
Automatically join the server after starting the game
Automatically join the server after Minecraft starts and loads.
Pre-check if the game core directory exists

Check the .minecraft/versions/<game core> directory before launching the game, and cancel launching if this folder cannot be confirmed to exist.
If the core directory exists and cannot be detected, please turn off this function. After turning it off, BakaXL will try to continue launching if it cannot confirm the existence of the folder, until the next time the existence of the core folder is confirmed.
This may cause BakaXL to appear abnormal when launching the game, or even crash. This setting is not globally synced to other BakaXLs on your computer.
Auto fix Json with ID setting not conforming to spec

If BakaXL detects that a core ID item in the Json file is not set properly, will automatically attempt to fix it.
In rare cases, automatic repair may cause an exception. After turning it off, BakaXL will only prompt you within the core selector when it detects bad Json. This setting is not globally synced to other BakaXLs on your computer.

Sets the garbage collector (GC) to use when using Java 9 or later Java. This option has no effect if your Java version is lower than Java 9.
"Z garbage collector(ZGC)"Only available with Java 11 or higher, using this recycler with the wrong Java version will cause the game to fail to launch.
If you don't know what this does, just leave it "Default".
Sets the size of Minecraft's window when it starts. BakaXL has listed some commonly used form sizes for you. Select Custom to manually set the form size.
Alerts you when you switch to a version of Minecraft that doesn't fix the Assets file.
If you think you messed up something, you can restore all advanced options to their default values.

Sets the image displayed in the background of the BakaXL window. While your image will not be uploaded, we recommend that you don't use any images that contain elements that may be considered inappropriate.

The background blur effect allows BakaXL to blur the content of the background, creating a comfortable and non-conflicting visual experience. The blur level cannot be manually adjusted when using a live background or if there is no background image. Windows 10 or higher is required to use blur effects.

Bind additional overlays at the bottom of BakaXL to display advanced dynamic backgrounds. Display dynamic backgrounds linked by BakaXL x Wallpaper Engine. This feature does not work properly in some resolutions and DPI scaling environments. If you are not currently using Wallpaper Engine, BakaXL will use your desktop wallpaper.

Turning this option on will allow the BakaXL window to be resized. Experimental feature, some of BakaXL's interface and functions have not yet adapted to larger form sizes. Some functions may not work properly.

Make the background image move with the cursor to create a parallax effect. When this feature is turned on, BakaXL will slightly enlarge the current background image. This feature is not available when using the Live Background or Default background.
Sets the color scheme used by BakaXL forms and buttons.

BakaSkin is a packaged file with personalized settings, allows you to save the color scheme, background and music sound effects, and share the personalized settings with your friends. BakaSkins are stored separately in the runtime directory of each BakaXL instance, the BakaSkins that have been set to take effect will be synchronized on this computer.
Save current personalization settings as BakaSkin
Check out community BakaSkins submitted by other BakaXL users or BakaSkins from BakaXL official on BakaPlaza.
This is a default BakaSkin, very default, REALLY default!
It's a custom BakaSkin and it's not packaged either, nothing special.
Will be used as the file name and display name of the BakaSkin file. Please don't include anything that makes others uncomfortable.

When BakaSkin loaded, the description will be displayed in the BakaSkin list. Please don't include anything that makes others uncomfortable. When using background images and background music not created by you, please indicate the image creator, source, music composer, singer, album title, etc.
BakaXL will display this icon in the BakaSkin list. It is suggested that the icon should match the theme and should not contain sextual content or anything that would make others uncomfortable.

After loading BakaSkin, BakaXL will play background music in following interfaces. · Global: Loop only the main background music in any interface · Split: Play different background music in "BakaXL Settings" and "BakaXL Tips" Right-click the corresponding button to preview the background music you choosed. To preview the music effect, BakaXL will automatically turns on the background music.
The current version of BakaSkin does not support custom sound effects.
The current version of BakaSKin does not support the custom color scheme feature.
BakaXL will use {0} as this BakaSkin Creator.
You are currently logged in to BakaXL Network, BakaXL defaults to use your BakaXL Network ID as this BakaSkin Creator.
You are not logged in to BakaXL Network, BakaXL will use the first of your profile username in your account profile list as this BakaSkin Creator.
To use your Minecraft Account profile name, please
Set the creator for this BakaSkin
Safety and Health, Copyright Protection and Disclaimer

When using the BakaSkin system, be sure to pay attention to the license of the resources you use. Please do not use content from unknown sources. You should and must credit the source of background images, icons, and music used in your theme and creator information. You may not use BakaSkins containing unauthorized content from third parties for any commercial purpose. For the physical and mental health of theme users and the protection of underages. BakaXL does not recommend that you use any elements or content that contain sexual contents or cause discomfort to others. You are not allowed to produce and disseminate any topics that violate national laws and related policies. BakaXL will take relevant measures to prohibit the loading or distribution of politically charged BakaSkins. In the event of the above, BakaXL has the right in accordance with the Privacy Policy to provide your information to public or government agencies to assist in investigations. If you create a BakaSkin through this page, it means that you have read and understand that you will be responsible for problems or potential legal consequences that may arise from making or sharing the BakaSkin, BakaXL and its development team will not be responsible. BakaXL takes steps to protect creators' copyrights if BakaXL receives a request from a creator indicating that a particular BakaSkin contains content from their creation without the relevant authorization, BakaXL will restrict users from distributing or using BakaSkin. You can always view full version of this policy on official BakaXL website.
Read full BakaSkin system usage policy
Exporting a theme means that you have read and understood the BakaSkin system usage policy. BakaSkin will be exported to the BakaXL instance's "BakaXL\Tema" folder.
"Accessibility" Allows you to customize the functions of BakaXL according to your personal needsto meet different usage conditions.

"Home screen display mode" will determine whether or not the BakaXL home page displays all tiles and features. · Standard: Home screen does not show start menu and feature tiles by default · Traditional: Home screen will always show the start menu and feature tiles While using Standard mode, you need to press the space or click the blank space of the main screen and drag up to enter the Start Menu.
"Toggle "Core" Tile" Will determine whether the "Core" tile is displayed in the start menu or not. You can always switch cores with a quick interaction from the launch bar. See "Quick Switch Core".

"Quick Switch Core" Provides an operation to quickly switch Minecraft cores on the launch bar · Standard: Don't show extra toggle core button on launch bar · Traditional: Display a extra button to switch cores on the launch bar While using standard mode, you need to switch cores by dragging the "Launch!" button.
Automatically stop BGM when losing focus
The BakaSkin you currently set up provides the BakaSkin background music for playback. When this option is off, BakaXL will turn off all background music in the interface.
BakaXL will use sound effects if your current BakaSkin includes sound packs. When this option is off, BakaXL will turn off all sound effects in the interface.
Lower the volume when using headphones

When this option is on, BakaXL will reduce the output volume of all audio controls. This option can be turned off if the volume of the BakaXL is still very low even when adjusted to maximum.
When using headphones, please avoid listening at high volume. Excessive volume will cause poor hearing. When you use headphones, adjust the volume to a level where you can hear surrounding sounds through the headphones.

When BakaXL starts, it will detect whether there is any audio output software running on the current computer. (Such as music players, voice chat software, etc.) When there is audio playing, BakaXL will automatically turn off or reduce the volume of the background music depends what are you doing. To restore the original volume level, simply hold down Ctrl and scroll the mouse wheel.
Use mirror source in mainland China
Use BMCLAPI from bangbang93 to speed up resource downloads for BakaXL.(In China) To learn more about BMCLAPI, see: https://bmclapidoc.bangbang93.com/
Very Fast (512 Threads / Do not Retry)
Launch Mode (2048 Threads / Do not Retry)

When waiting for a long time for BakaXL to complete Minecraft resources, change this option according to your network and desktop configuration. Attempting to re-download when the download fails will use more time, try adjusting the number of retrys.
While using"Launch Mode",will stop updating the status of the download (e.g. download percentage)
The theoretical speed is not achieved in all cases. (maybe even slower) Please choose according to the network and desktop configuration.
Some of BakaXL's files use the file download service provided by Minecraft Chinese Forum(McBBS) See: https://www.mcbbs.net/

Turn on when using a cellular data connection, When turned on, BakaPlaza will ask you and reduce the clarity of video playback before playback. Not all videos available in BakaPlaza supports reduced definition playback.

The BakaXL protocol allows you to quickly launch BakaXL through a button provided by the website. Depending on the parameters provided by the website buttons, BakaXL can directly activate certain built-in functions. See BakaXL Developer Center to learn how to integrate your website into the BakaXL protocol.

BakaXL comes to a new version! Thanks to all of the members who joined BakaXL Insider Preview Program. Without their help, we wouldn't be able to make BakaXL as great as it is.
Now you too can join us in making BakaXL even better.
Join the BakaXL Insider Preview Program now! Get early access and help provide feedback.
Features in BakaXL Insider Preview are for PREVIEW only and may removed or changed in future without notice.
The Preview version of BakaXL lacks key features and functions, please do not add it to modpack for sharing.

We've introduced a new update channel mechanism for BakaXL, which means you can get updates more often!
Currently, we offer two channels for the BakaXL Insider Program: Pigeon Channel (The main evaluation version, providing the most stable feature updates in the near future) Parrot Channel (Daily real-time updates, providing the latest updates to the BakaXL code repository)
CAUTION: Parrot channel contains a lot of early undeveloped and cleaned up features and is subject to change, do not rely on this channel.

Your computer needs to have .Net Framework 4.5 installed to run BakaXL 3.0. Using the Insider version of BakaXL 3.0 requires you to use Windows 7 or higher. It is recommended that you use the Windows 10 operating system to experience the full functionality of BakaXL 3.0.
BakaXL 3.0 no longer supports the Windows XP operating system.
Support the developer now with Afdian

Whether you sponsor or not, we thank you for using BakaXL! But if you sponsored BakaXL through Afdian, your Afdian username will be displayed here!
Sorted by sponsorship time, the most recent sponsorship will be displayed first. This list will be updated automatically every 6 hours.
Looks like theres no sponsors, so sad...
All the members of BakaXL Developerment Team thank you for using BakaXL sincerely!
Only pushes the most stable test version
You can press the HOME button to get back to the content
Force quit the current content may cause the progress rate lost, and this process is irreversible.

The login interface of the Microsoft account server has changed, and it is currently not possible to verify the original version through this method. We will release an software update as soon as possible to adapt to the new changes, and we're apologize for any inconvenience caused.

This account is not yet owned Minecraft

This Microsoft account does not appear to have purchased Minecraft. Please check if you are logged into the wrong account, or try again after a while.
If you purchased Minecraft with a Mojang account instead of a Microsoft account, then you may have selected the wrong authentic authentication mode, you should choose "Mojang Verification"。
If you are an Xbox Game Pass holder, you will need to use "Official Minecraft Launcher" Do a one-time login and do the game ID setup. Only then can third-party launchers such as BakaXL be used for ownership verification.
There are no Minecraft profiles for this account

This Microsoft account has purchased Minecraft, but does not contain a Minecraft account profile.
If you are an Xbox Game Pass holder or have never set up a Minecraft game ID after purchasing the game, you will need to use "Official Minecraft Launcher" Do a one-time login and do the game ID setup. Only then can third-party launchers such as BakaXL be used for ownership verification.

Your account is classified as a underage account by Microsoft. Before continuing to log in, you need to associate this account with an adult Microsoft account. Contact your guardian to add this account to Microsoft Family before you can use the Xbox Live service.
(Or change the account age to 18 or older...)
Go https://account.xbox.com/ Learn how to link underage accounts
Account has not created an Xbox profile
The account you are logged in with does not currently have an Xbox profile created. To log into Minecraft with a Microsoft account, your Microsoft account must create an Xbox profile.
Go https://account.xbox.com/ Login and sign up for your Xbox profile

Please use your computer browser or smart mobile device, Visit {0} and enter code {1} to complete the login. After click "OK" button, BakaXL will copy this code and automatically open the verification page.
If the page does not open automatically, please manually visit {0} to continue
The communication protocol has been autocompleted
BakaXL has detected that you do not have an authentication server communication protocol set. Will automatically using HTTPS secure protocol to connect authentication server.
Be caution connecting to this authentication server
This authentication server does not use the HTTPS security protocol. Continuing to use this authentication server will result in your password being transmitted insecurely.
Server addresses using secure protocols always start with https://

Please contact the authentication server developer for more information

Please go to the account platform for this verification server for more information

By enabling Advanced Search, you authorize BakaXL to traverse the files on your computer's disk. BakaXL will search the root directory of each disk and then proceed to traverse folders containing the following names:
Minecraft、Java、Jre、Jdk、MC、Runtime
If you do not understand what this feature does, please click "Cancel".
BakaXL will not stores index of your disk contents in any way.
At least one Minecraft account profile is required to continue
Before making a BakaSkin, you need to create at least a Minecraft account profile.
The icon file may be incomplete or damaged and BakaXL cannot read it. Please check or replace an icon file and try again.
Before generating a BakaSkin, you need to set a non-empty display name for the BakaSkin.
Before generating a BakaSkin, you need to set a non-empty description for the BakaSkin.
Before generating a BakaSkin, you need to set an icon for the BakaSkin.
Before generating a BakaSkin, you need to set a creator for this BakaSkin. Check that your creator settings are correct in the BakaSkin creator area.
You have not set the main background music for this BakaSkin. BakaSkin need to contain at least one main background music.
You have not set a split background music for this BakaSkin. If you choose to use split music mode, you need to set different background music for "BakaXL Settings" and "BakaXL Tips"

Do you want to install this modpack to BakaXL?
"{0}" will be installed into the same folder as the current BakaXL instance. Once the integration package installation starts, it can't be stopped at all~! Do you wanna start the installation?
If you just want to get the installation file of this modpack, please click the Save As button on the right.

Quick settings can help you automatically set the Java virtual machine and memory required for Minecraft to run according to the current state of the system.
Quick Setup will also: · Turn on BakaXL's background music and sound effects · Allow BakaPlaza to request your location · Send crash and startup diagnostics to BakaXL · Enable BMCLAPI to speed up resource downloads in mainland China · Automatically loads all installed BakaXL plugins (not all third-party plugins are safe)
If you do not know the memory size required by the Java Virtual Machine and the game, please use the quick settings
It looks like you don't currently have Java installed on your computer. The Java Virtual Machine is a must-have for running Minecraft, so be sure to install it.
If BakaXL does not find your Java, you can also locate its path manually

It looks like you don't currently have Java installed on your computer. You can continue through the setup wizard and BakaXL will automatically install the appropriate Java when you launch the game.
If you believe you have Java installed, don't worry. Go "BakaXL Settings - Java VM & Memory" and try "Advanced Search" to search for Java.
You can always modify the Java Virtual Machine settings in BakaXL Settings
Could not load credential settings for this core

Something unexpected happened that prevented BakaXL from reading credential settings from the currently set modpack or core. You can continue with the setup and BakaXL will double check the credential settings when launching the core.

Before proceeding, BakaXL requires the account information you provided when registering with a third-party verification service. BakaXL will store your data locally with industry-standard encryption, and your information will not be uploaded to any server.

Your current system memory is less than 512MB. Forcing the MC to start may cause some abnormal phenomena (for example, it may fail to start). It is recommended that you close irrelevant software.（Like Discord, Spotify, Chrome etc.）

This Lobby Code is currently in use

Your desired Lobby Code is currently unavailable because there are lobbies in the BakaXL Network that are using this Lobby Code. Please change a code, or wait for the lobby with this code to dissolve.
Your friend {0} invited you to join the lobby <{1}>they created. Wanna Join Now?
Player {0} has requested to join the lobby you are currently in, wanna let them in?
Kick this player out of the lobby?

As the supreme lobby owner, your next actions will result in this player being kicked out of the lobby. If it is currently in a Minecraft local area network connection or file transfer, these connections will also be disconnected.
BakaXL has request to the lobby... Huh? Why didn't you enter the lobby number?

BakaXL has sent a request to the creator of lobby {0}. You will join the lobby after the creator allows it.
If the lobby is a friend lobby, you need to become friends with the creator first.
Are you sure you want to dismiss this lobby?

If you choose to dissolve the lobby, all established connections will be disconnected. If you are in a Minecraft local area network connection or file transfer, these connections will also be disconnected.
You will leave this lobby if you decide to leave. If you are in a Minecraft local area network connection or file transfer, these connections will also be disconnected.
If I were your friend, I would not let you go~
Although this user exists in the lobby, he does not exist in the BakaXL Network. Well, this is weird. Maybe because you observed this, so he doesn't exist now.
Haven't started Minecraft LAN connection yet

You need to start the game with the currently running BakaXL and select in single player"open to LAN network"。 If you have opened the LAN game, you need to wait at least 10 seconds before the lobby can be created.
If it fails to detect for a long time, please try to run BakaXL as administrator
BakaXL is currently unable to create lobbies. This may be due to this lobby code being used or unavailable, please replace it and try again.
The lobby server greets you and expresses confusion :/
It needs to be enabled by both the creator and the joiner to take effect

You are turning on the BakaXL Network Relay relay connection feature. For data privacy and security reasons, BakaXL will only connect through relays when both the lobby creator and joiner have enabled this feature.
If you turn on the relay and still cannot play, maybe the other party has not turned on this function.
Whoops, looks like the lobby creator kicked you out of the lobby. Please make sure you are not violating the Community Guidelines or acting in a way that makes others uncomfortable in the lobby.
BakaXL doesn't have an better idea either
The lobby creator has disbanded the lobby and everyone is outside now. It's possible that the creator was tired, or the creator's internet connection blew up.

This Tips channel is currently closed to the public, which may be due to: · Received a request from the issuer to suspend access. · Automatically locked due to too many user reports. · Violation of BakaXL Tips System Terms of Use

The Json ID for this core is incorrect, BakaXL has fixed it automatically
BakaXL has saved this Minecraft character's skin
BakaXL has uploaded a skin to this Minecraft character
BakaXL encountered an error uploading this skin
Please report this bug to the BakaXL development team immediately so that it can be fixed ASAP.
The remote server connection timed out.

BakaXL cannot get the latest Minecraft core list via BMCLAPI or official download sources.
In some cases, the issue may be because your Internet Service Provider (ISP) is hijacking your traffic.
Please check your internet connection to make sure the network communication between your computer and the download source is working.

If this issue persists, you can report the issue to the BakaXL development team.
The remote server returned an incorrect data.

The preparation of the core list could not be completed because the official Minecraft download source or BMCLAPI returned a version information not recognized by the current BakaXL.
In some cases, the issue may be due to your Internet Service Provider (ISP) hijacking the returned data.
Please check your internet connection to make sure the network communication between your computer and the download source is working.

If this issue persists, you can report the issue to the BakaXL development team.
ULauncherCore reported exception when preparing game version

Usually, this problem occurs because ULauncherCore cannot properly prepare a specific Minecraft version.
Please check your internet connection to make sure the network communication between your computer and the download source is working.

You can visit BakaXL Settings - Download and switch Use mirror source in mainland china button and try again.
If this issue persists, you can report the issue to the BakaXL development team.

Unable to locate the front-end Minecraft base core required for this version of Forge: .minecraft/versions/{0}/{1}.jar。\r\n\r\nYou can try installing the vanilla core for this Minecraft version first and try again.
The BakaXL Forge installer reported an exception while installing.

Forge version tried to install: Forge-{0}-{1}

This problem may be caused by the inability to download the file, or an accident when unzipping.
First, please check your internet connection to make sure that the network communication between your computer and the download source is working properly.
Second, try running BakaXL as administrator and try the installation again.

If this issue persists, you can report the issue to the BakaXL development team.

Forge version tried to install: Forge-{0}-{1}

Usually, this can be caused by corrupted downloaded files, insufficient access to local files, or unsupported versions of Forge.
First, try running BakaXL as administrator and try the installation again.
Second, check the exception message in this Error Can, if it clearly states that this version of Forge is not supported, please report this Error Can to the BakaXL development team.

If this issue persists, you can report the issue to the BakaXL development team.
Unable to parse Forge's install profile (install_profile), the Json interpreter returned empty text.

The Forge core (universal.jar) included with this version of the Forge installer could not be found.\r\n\r\nIncompatible Forge version, please report this Forge version to the BakaXL development team:Forge-{0}-{1}
The BakaXL Fabric installer reported an exception while installing.
Could not parse Fabric's installation archive (json), Json interpreter returned empty text.
Unable to copy json files from vanilla Minecraft.
The BakaXL Quilt installer reported an exception while installing.
Unable to parse the Quilt installation archive (json), the Json interpreter returned empty text.
Unable to copy json file from vanilla Minecraft.
The BakaXL Optifine installer reported an exception while installing.
ULauncherCore reported exception when preparing game version

Usually, this problem occurs because ULauncherCore cannot properly prepare a specific Minecraft version. Please check your internet connection to make sure the network communication between your computer and the download source is working.
You can visit BakaXL Settings - Download and switch Use mirror source in mainland china button and try again. If this issue persists, you can report the issue to the BakaXL development team.

BakaXL will display the add-ons that can be installed for the currently selected version of Minecraft. If a component is not compatible with the current version or other components, it will be disabled.
BakaXL Please maintain an internet connection while installing Minecraft. If you are currently using cellular data connection, the installation process may charge extra fee.
When using this installation configuration, BakaXL will install OptiFine as a MOD.
When using this installation configuration, BakaXL will install OptiFine as a MOD. To use Optifine in Fabric, you need to additionally install OptiFabric by yourself.

BakaXL supports parsing packaged modpack installation configuration files, and automatically installs and completes missing content.
Types of modpacks that BakaXL supports for automatic installation: · MCBBS format modpacks (Protocol Specification v2, .zip) · CurseForge format modpacks (.zip) · Modrinth modpack description file (.mrpack) · Some traditional Minecraft modpacks that directly include the launcher (.zip)
There are individual differences in the integration package, and sometimes even the above formats may not be imported normally. If you encounter errors or crashes when importing the integration modpack, or fail to start or missing files after importing, Please submit this modpack to BakaXL for analysis.
To protect the interests of Curse modpack authors and mod authors. We have now discontinued the installation of modpacks compatible with the CurseForge format.
Drag and drop the file containing the mod pack here
BakaXL will automatically start installation after recognizing the contents of a mod package

If this is a proper Modpack file, BakaXL will install it for you
